name: Soumonetra Chaudhury , MSc Clinical Psychology
position: Trauma-informed Queer Affirmative || Gold Medalist || Mental Health Advocate
about: Psychologist and a published researcher with a Gold Medal in her UG and a class topper in her Masters. I have had training in queer affirmative counselling practice, trauma and crisis intervention, suicide prevention gatekeeping, individual therapy, and couple therapy. I work with the adult population using a trauma-informed care lens and an eclectic approach tailored to your needs.

current_company.name: MindPeers
current_company.title: Trauma-informed Queer Affirmative || Gold Medalist || Mental Health Advocate

experience.title: Probono Therapist
experience.description: • Utilized active listening skills and an eclectic approach incorporating Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Solution-Focused Brief Therapy (SFBT), IFT (Internal Family Systems) and Interpersonal Therapy (IPT) to provide effective counseling services to clients• Created a welcoming and inclusive environment for clients from diverse backgrounds, including the LGBTQ+ community
experience.description_html: • Utilized active listening skills and an eclectic approach incorporating Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Solution-Focused Brief Therapy (SFBT), IFT (Internal Family Systems) and Interpersonal Therapy (IPT) to provide effective counseling services to clients• Created a welcoming and inclusive environment for clients from diverse backgrounds, including the LGBTQ+ community <!---->

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Conducted comprehensive psychological assessments of patients, including evaluations of intelligence, learning disabilities, personality disorders, and symptoms of depression, anxiety, and OCD under the supervision of the head Clinical Psychologist.• Developed and implemented behavioral interventions for children with neurodevelopmental disorders to help improve their social and emotional functioning and overall quality of life.• Applied knowledge and skills in conducting mental status examinations and formulating comprehensive case histories, with a focus on evidence-based practices and compassionate care.
experience.description_html: • Conducted comprehensive psychological assessments of patients, including evaluations of intelligence, learning disabilities, personality disorders, and symptoms of depression, anxiety, and OCD under the supervision of the head Clinical Psychologist.• Developed and implemented behavioral interventions for children with neurodevelopmental disorders to help improve their social and emotional functioning and overall quality of life.• Applied knowledge and skills in conducting mental status examinations and formulating comprehensive case histories, with a focus on evidence-based practices and compassionate care.
experience.company: Government Medical College and Hospital, Jammu

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Observed and participated in the treatment of a diverse patient population, including those with severe psychiatric disorders and complex comorbidities, to gain a comprehensive understanding of mental health disorders and their treatments• Observed medication management and assisted with the implementation of psychotherapeutic interventions to improve patient outcomes.• Committed to providing compassionate and evidence-based care to individuals struggling with mental health issues.
experience.description_html: • Observed and participated in the treatment of a diverse patient population, including those with severe psychiatric disorders and complex comorbidities, to gain a comprehensive understanding of mental health disorders and their treatments• Observed medication management and assisted with the implementation of psychotherapeutic interventions to improve patient outcomes.• Committed to providing compassionate and evidence-based care to individuals struggling with mental health issues. <!---->

experience.title: Apprenticeship and Supervision
experience.description: • Received in-depth training in a variety of counseling techniques and worked as a pro-bono counselor through the organization's volunteer counseling program to gain practical experience under the supervision of a clinical psychologist.• Developed case histories and treatment plans for clients and conducted ongoing assessments to track progress and make adjustments as needed.• Provided crisis intervention services to clients in need and collaborated with other mental health professionals to ensure comprehensive care. Utilized evidence-based practices and stayed up-to-date on the latest research in the field to provide the best possible care to clients.
experience.description_html: • Received in-depth training in a variety of counseling techniques and worked as a pro-bono counselor through the organization's volunteer counseling program to gain practical experience under the supervision of a clinical psychologist.• Developed case histories and treatment plans for clients and conducted ongoing assessments to track progress and make adjustments as needed.• Provided crisis intervention services to clients in need and collaborated with other mental health professionals to ensure comprehensive care. Utilized evidence-based practices and stayed up-to-date on the latest research in the field to provide the best possible care to clients.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: •Assisted the rehabilitation counsellor in a therapeutic community setting•Supported residents in increasing their activities of daily living•Administered various psychiatric interventions such as counselling, psychoeducation, and relaxation techniques on the residents•Collaborated with the team to develop and implement individualized care plans for the residents•Maintained accurate and up-to-date records of the residents' progress and treatment interventions.

experience.title: Psychology Intern
experience.description: •Created academic content for the organization's website and social media handles•Hosted and co-moderated webinars and workshops for the organization•Prepared well-structured academic modules for the organization's clients•Executed brand building strategies•Assisted with administrative tasks•Worked collaboratively with the team to achieve project goals

experience.title: Clinical Psychology Intern
experience.description: • Conducted behavioral medicine assessments to identify the psychological, behavioral, and social factors that impact a patient's health and overall well-being.• Administered various psychological tests such as Thematic Apperception Test (TAT), Sentence Completion Test (SCT), Beck Depression Inventory (BDI), Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI), and Hamilton Anxiety Scale (HAM-A) to assess patients' psychological symptoms and develop appropriate interventions.• Collected and analyzed data from assessments, generated individualized reports with insights, and documented findings accurately and concisely in medical records for further evaluation.
experience.description_html: • Conducted behavioral medicine assessments to identify the psychological, behavioral, and social factors that impact a patient's health and overall well-being.• Administered various psychological tests such as Thematic Apperception Test (TAT), Sentence Completion Test (SCT), Beck Depression Inventory (BDI), Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI), and Hamilton Anxiety Scale (HAM-A) to assess patients' psychological symptoms and develop appropriate interventions.• Collected and analyzed data from assessments, generated individualized reports with insights, and documented findings accurately and concisely in medical records for further evaluation.
experience.company: Under C.R. Satish kumar (Consultant Clinical Psychologist)

experience.title: Child and adolescent psychology intern
experience.description: • Acquired knowledge of the principles of occupational psychology and applied it to clinical psychology to identify and develop treatment plans that improved patients' mental health and functioning.• Learned play therapy techniques to help children and adolescents with emotional and behavioral issues communicate their feelings in a non-judgmental environment.• Administered the Childhood Autism Rating Scale (CARS) assessments to diagnose and evaluate the severity of autism spectrum disorders under the supervision of a trained facilitator.
experience.description_html: • Acquired knowledge of the principles of occupational psychology and applied it to clinical psychology to identify and develop treatment plans that improved patients' mental health and functioning.• Learned play therapy techniques to help children and adolescents with emotional and behavioral issues communicate their feelings in a non-judgmental environment.• Administered the Childhood Autism Rating Scale (CARS) assessments to diagnose and evaluate the severity of autism spectrum disorders under the supervision of a trained facilitator.

recommendations: Charvi Pareek “Soumonetra takes initiative and has a unique perspective about things. Not only does she think comprehensively but also makes sure to voice out her opinions, which is a noteworthy quality!”

Anoushka Acharya “Commitment, patience, and openness to learn are one of the defining values that Soumonetra possesses as an aspiring clinical psychologist. She has the ability of making valuable contributions to any organisation that she works with! I wish her all the best for her future endeavours! ”

publications: [{"title":"Impact of Menstrual Distress on Interpersonal Relationships, School Absenteeism, Work Productivity","date":"March 31, 2023","description":"• Contributed a book chapter on the impact of menstrual distress on interpersonal relationships, school absenteeism, peer relations, work productivity, and academic performance for IGI Global.• This research offers a comprehensive understanding of the impact of menstrual distress on various domains of life and provides recommendations for interventions and support."},{"title":"Cognitive and biological challenges of menopausal women in India ","subtitle":"Life Research","date":"July 5, 2022","description":"•Conducted a comprehensive review of literature on cognitive and biological challenges faced by menopausal women in India.• Published in a reputable peer-reviewed TMR Integrative Medicine Journal• This research sheds light on the unique challenges faced by women during their menopausal stage and provides insights for future interventions and treatments"},{"title":"Personality, Cognitive flexibility and motivation among medical professional during COVID-19 pandemic: A correlational study","subtitle":"Journal of nursing","date":"February 5, 2022","description":"• Presented a research paper on the relationship between motivation, cognitive flexibility, and personality of medical professionals at the Young Psychology Competition, 2020.• Indexed by the World Health Organization (WHO).• This research highlights the important role of personality, motivation and cognitive flexibility in enhancing the performance of medical professionals."},{"title":"Review Paper on Cognitive and Biological Challenges during Menopause","subtitle":"TMR Integrative Medicine Journal","date":"July 30, 2021","description":"• Explored cognitive and biological challenges experienced by menopausal women.• Published review paper in TMR Integrative Medicine Journal.• This research highlights the cognitive and biological changes experienced by menopausal women and suggests future implications for treatment and interventions.• doi 10.53388/2022-0622-401"},{"title":"Academic Engagement among College Students in Urban Bangalore: Exploring Institutional and Individual Level Determinants of Academic Engagement","subtitle":"Journal of Educational Psychology","date":"August 6, 2020","description":"• Conducted a comprehensive study on institutional and individual-level determinants of academic engagement among college students in urban Bangalore.• Published in a reputable peer-reviewed Journal of Psychology and Education, cited by three published papers.• This research provides insights into the complex interplay of institutional and individual-level factors that influence student academic engagement and performance."},{"title":"Personality Severity, Codependency, Identifying Red Flags: Role of Childhood Emotional Abuse","description":"• Conducted a study on the role of childhood emotional abuse in personality severity and codependency.• Presented the research paper at the International Conference on Couseling, Psychotherapy and Wellness, 2023• This research aims to raise awareness of the negative impact of childhood emotional abuse and its long-term effects on mental health."}]
